name: Captivus
description: Join the movement! Build a deck, equip your ship, and take on others in intense 1v1 card battles!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 650 DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
